The story about warrior's name is bs. The story about special
presentation fittings is most likely bs too - if you want an opinion
it's possible if you provide some pictures.

If there is a swastika on the scabbard - it's a chinese fake. If you
can find a sword on e-bay that looks 100% like yours - it's a chinese
fake.


> No problem, I dont know what I have it wasnt what I bought in the 
> auction ... lol .. and everyone here abouts has his own opinion, but 
> I rather get the opinions of true collector, that why the post.
> Ran
